name: webauthn
description: This is the source code used to build the Yubico WebAuthn Kit solution. The backend is built as a SAM template to be deployed via the [AWS Serverless Application Repository](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/serverless-sam-template-publishing-applications.html). The clients will be used to demonstrate the WebAuthn flow to the serverless backend.
author: Yubico AB
